MoaExplanation: There is a conflict between ASA 81mg and Pain relievers (e.g., acetaminophen) as both are medications that can increase the risk of bleeding when used together.
PmhExplanation: There is a conflict between s/p cholecystectomy and Ursodeoxycholic acid (UDCA) as UDCA may not be beneficial after cholecystectomy.
RevisedReason: Conflicts exist between the MOA (ASA 81mg and Pain relievers) and PMH (s/p cholecystectomy and Ursodeoxycholic acid).
RevisedSuggestion: Consider alternative pain relief for the patient and reevaluate the necessity of prescribing UDCA post-cholecystectomy.
